data.name: Mambo Wave - Outfit DLC
data.detailed_description: Mambo Wave - Outfit DLC! Now Available on steam. Unlock 5 New Outfits For Mambo And Show who has the best style on the battlefield!
data.about_the_game: Mambo Wave - Outfit DLC! Now Available on steam. Unlock 5 New Outfits For Mambo And Show who has the best style on the battlefield!
data.short_description: Mambo Wave - Outfit DLC! Now Available on steam. Unlock 5 New Outfits For Mambo And Show who have the best style in the battlefield!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel pentium g5420 / Amd Fx 4300 or Higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or Higher
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card / Motherboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / Amd Ryzen 3 Series Or Higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 Or Higher
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card / Motherboard sound

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
